name: Name
mapping: Please provide details about the field names in your bank statement file
date-tooltip: Please fill in the date field from your bank statement file
description-tooltip: Please fill in the description field from your bank statement file
notes-tooltip: Please fill in the notes field from your bank statement file
amount-tooltip: Please fill in the amount field from your bank statement file
payee-tooltip: Please fill in the payee field from your bank statement file
number-style: choose whether Euro-style numbering is used, for example 1.234,56
public-des: choose whether this source can be shared with other or if it should be kept private
uniqFiels-des: fill the name of the field that can be used to uniquely identify an income or expense item
date-Format: fill the date format is using in your statement
fill-required-fields: Please fill out all required fields
failed-to-add-expense-source: Failed to add expense source. Please try again later
failed-to-update-expense-source: Failed to update expense source. Please try again later
entry-add-error: Failed to add expense . Please try again later
